thread.title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St opens higher as trade war fears cool

author: Reuters Editorial
title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St opens higher as trade war fears cool
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Wall Street opened higher on Thursday as fears of a global trade war ebbed following signs that President Donald Trumpâ€™s proposed hefty import tariffs on steel and aluminum could exclude key trading partners.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 53.09 points, or 0.21 percent, to 24,854.45. The S&P 500 gained 5.52 points, or 0.20 percent, to 2,732.32. The Nasdaq Composite added 24.92 points, or 0.34 percent, to 7,421.57.
Reporting by Sruthi Shankar in Bengaluru; Editing by Sriraj Kalluvila
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
